WorkItem.Description:
I followed the instructions in [Re-enabling the CommandManager feature with RelayCommand in MVVM Light V5 ](http://blog.galasoft.ch/posts/2015/01/re-enabling-the-commandmanager-feature-with-relaycommand-in-mvvm-light-v5/)

In the attached project, the buttons are disabled when clicked, but only are enabled if the GUI is clicked after the task attached to each button has finished.

Have I done something wrong?

David

Comments.Message: Seems to be related to [url: https://mvvmlight.codeplex.com/workitem/7730]. I will take a look in V5.3.1.
